thread.title: Pray for the dancing house that fell off stage during Katy Perry's BRIT Awards performance
thread.title_full: Pray for the dancing house that fell off stage during Katy Perry's BRIT Awards performance

author: Laura Vitto
title: Pray for the dancing house that fell off stage during Katy Perry's BRIT Awards performance
text:
Pray for the dancing house that fell off stage during Katy Perry's BRIT Awards performance 0 2017-02-22 23:27:43 UTC 
In the grind that is awards show season, not everyone makes it out unscathed. 
Take for example this background dancer who fell off stage during Katy Perry's "Chained to the Rhythm" performance at Wednesday's BRIT Awards.
